descriptionHtml:
The Dark Ones inhabit The Pit of Sorrow, the forgotten 17th plane of Oblivion which is ruled by Nemesis, the Daedra Prince of Damnation. Nemesis is the oldest and most powerful of the Daedra. Fearing his power the other Daedra Princes have kept Nemesis and The Dark Ones Trapped in their realm. Their presence in Tamriel and how they got there remains an enigma.

One Handed 10
Heavy armor 5
Smithing 5
Destruction 5
Conjuration 5
Speech 5

V1.2: Turned pentagram upside down, decided it looked better this way in the end

Dark One Vision(power) - Night eye for 60 seconds
Waterbreathing
Shield of Darkness(power) - Fortify Armor for 10 minutes

Fully Voiced unique combat and detection sounds



Male Voice Jon Stawarz (Voice Actors Alliance)
Female Voice Cody Bear (Voice Actors Alliance)


This mod is compatible with my other race mod "The Fallen"
author: Morrowind1979
